format: A data frame with 112 observations on the following 12 variables.

parameters.congress: The number of that year's Congress
parameters.np2: Number of seats held by the second political party
parameters.np1: Number of seats held by the first political party
parameters.p1: Name of the first political party
parameters.p2: Name of the second political party

reference:
Party Divisions of the House of Representatives, 1789 to Present.
https://history.house.gov/Institution/Party-Divisions/Party-Divisions.
title: United States House of Representatives historical make-up
description:
Description
The make-up of the United States House of Representatives every two years
since 1789. The last Congress included is the 112th Congress, which
completed its term in 2013.
